stats.stat: SELECT * FROM (SELECT tn, COUNT(tx) AS namecnt, tx FROM (SELECT dt.TaxonId, taxon.TaxonID AS tx, taxon.FullName AS tn FROM taxon,determination AS dt WHERE dt.TaxonId = taxon.TaxonID AND dt.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID) AS newTable GROUP BY tx ORDER BY namecnt DESC) T4 WHERE namecnt > 10

SELECT g.Name AS Country, (select COUNT(CollectionObjectID) from collectionobject co inner join collectingevent ce on ce.CollectingEventID = co.CollectingEventID inner join locality l on l.Localityid = ce.Localityid inner join geography g2 on g2.GeographyID = l.GeographyID where g2.NodeNumber between g.NodeNumber and g.HighestChildNodeNumber AND co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND ce.StartDate IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(ce.StartDate) <= YEAR(CURDATE()) ) AS SpecimenCount, g.GeographyID AS ID FROM geography g where g.rankid = 200 ORDER BY SpecimenCount DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM collectionobject WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT d.TaxonID) FROM determination d INNER JOIN taxon t ON t.TaxonID = d.TaxonID WHERE d.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND d.IsCurrent <> 0 AND t.IsAccepted <> 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT g.GeographyID) FROM locality l INNER JOIN geography g ON g.GeographyID = l.GeographyID WHERE l.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND g.IsAccepted <> 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geography WHERE GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND Latitude1 is not NULL AND Longitude1 is not NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM preparation WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID
SELECT SUM(IF (CountAmt IS NULL, 1, CountAmt)) FROM preparation WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lithostrat WHERE LithoStratTreeDefID = LITHOTREEDEFID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT l.LithoStratID) FROM paleocontext p INNER JOIN lithostrat l ON l.LithoStratID = p.LithoStratID WHERE p.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND l.IsAccepted <> 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geologictimeperiod WHERE GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT g.GeologicTimePeriodID) FROM paleocontext p INNER JOIN geologictimeperiod g ON g.GeologicTimePeriodID = p.ChronosStratID WHERE p.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND g.IsAccepted <> 0
SELECT CollectionName FROM collection WHERE CollectionID = COLMEMID
SELECT Name FROM discipline WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID
SELECT Name FROM division WHERE DivisionID = DIVID
SELECT Name FROM institution
SELECT Type FROM discipline WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID

SELECT SUM(CNT), YR FROM (SELECT IF (co.CountAmt IS NULL, 1, co.CountAmt) AS CNT, YEAR(ce.StartDate) AS YR FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID = ce.CollectingEventID WHERE ce.StartDate IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(ce.StartDate) <= YEAR(CURDATE()) ) T1 GROUP BY YR
SELECT Type FROM discipline WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID
SELECT COUNT(DeterminationID) FROM determination WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND TypeStatusName is not null

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tx.TaxonID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tax.TaxonID,tax.nodenumber FROM (SELECT TaxonID FROM determination WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent = true) as Families1,taxon as tax WHERE tax.isaccepted <> 0 and tax.TaxonID = Families1.TaxonID) as Families2, taxon as tx WHERE tx.rankid = 140 and Families2.nodenumber between tx.nodenumber and tx.HighestChildNodeNumber) as Familes3

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT tx.TaxonID) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tax.TaxonID,tax.nodenumber FROM (SELECT TaxonID FROM determination WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent <> 0) as Genera1,taxon as tax WHERE tax.isaccepted <> 0 and tax.TaxonID = Genera1.TaxonID) as Genera2, taxon as tx WHERE tx.rankid = 180 and Genera2.nodenumber between tx.nodenumber and tx.HighestChildNodeNumber

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT tx.TaxonID) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT tax.TaxonID,tax.nodenumber FROM (SELECT TaxonID FROM determination WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent <> 0) as Genera1,taxon as tax WHERE tax.isaccepted <> 0 and tax.TaxonID = Genera1.TaxonID) as Genera2, taxon as tx WHERE tx.rankid = 220 and Genera2.nodenumber between tx.nodenumber and tx.HighestChildNodeNumber
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality INNER JOIN discipline ON locality.DisciplineID = discipline.DisciplineID WHERE discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geography WHERE GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID

SELECT COUNT(Name) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT Name FROM (SELECT g.GeographyID,g.nodenumber FROM locality as l inner join geography as g on l.GeographyID = g.GeographyID) as GEO, geography as g WHERE g.rankid = 200 and GEO.nodenumber between g.nodenumber and g.HighestChildNodeNumber) As GEO2

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality INNER JOIN discipline ON locality.DisciplineID = discipline.DisciplineID WHERE discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((COUNT(localityid) * 1.0) / ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM locality) * 1.0)) * 100.0 END AS PercentGeoReferencedLocalities FROM locality WHERE not latitude1 is null
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND rankid = 60
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND rankid = 100
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND rankid = 140
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND rankid = 180
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND rankid = 220
SELECT TypeStatusName, COUNT(DeterminationID) AS DeterminationCount FROM determination WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND TypeStatusName is not null group by TypeStatusName
SELECT TypeStatusName, COUNT(TypeStatusName) CNT FROM determination WHERE TypeStatusName IS NOT NULL GROUP BY TypeStatusName ORDER BY CNT DESC
